li&#123;padding-left:6px&#125;@media (max-width:720px)&#123;.markdown-body h1&#123;font-size:24px&#125;.markdown-body h2&#123;font-size:20px&#125;.markdown-body h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><h2 data-id="heading-0">前言</h2>
<p>Hello 大家好！ 我是前端 <strong>无名</strong></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">背景</h2>
<p>每天都在不间断的写业务，React 项目做了一个又一个，好多年了，要新建一个React项目，直接copy 旧项目，然后删除旧业务逻辑，修修减减一个新的项目框架就起来了。</p>
<p>这样导致的结果：</p>
<ol>
<li>创建项目耗时太长</li>
<li>修修减减项目框架不稳定</li>
<li>不利于迭代优化框架</li>
<li>...</li>
</ol>
<p>所以就有了搭建自己的一套React项目框架的想法,开箱即用。</p>
<p>本篇文章先介绍项目模板的功能，后续会介绍该项目如何搭建以及如何设计。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">项目结构</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-markdown copyable" lang="markdown">react-project-template
├── .babelrc # babel配置
├──  Webpack # webpack公用配置目录
│ │  ├──plugins # 公用插件集合
│ │  ├──resolve # webpack resolve配置
│ │  ├──utils # webpack 工具类
│ │  ├──variable # webpack 变量配置
│ ├── webpack.base.js # Webpack 基础配置文件
│ ├── webpack.dev.js # Webpack 开发环境配置文件
│ └── webpack.prod.js # Webpack 生产环境配置文件
├── yarn.lock # 锁定 npm 包依赖版本文件
├── package.json
├── postcss.config.js # 自动兼容 CSS3 样式配置文件
├── prettier.config.js # 检查项目代码风格配置文件
├── public # 存放html模板
├── README.md
├── src
│ ├── assets # 存放会被 Webpack 处理的静态资源文件：一般是自己写的 js、css 或者图片等静态资源
│ │ ├── fonts # iconfont 目录
│ │ ├── images # 图片资源目录
│ │ ├── css # 全局样式目录
│ │ │  ├── common.scss # 全局通用样式目录
│ │ │  ├── core.scss # 全局sass 变量目录,直接使用，不需要引用，全局已统一引入。
│ │ │  └── init.scss # 全局初始化css
│ │ └── js # 全局js
│ ├── common # 存放项目通用文件
│ │ ├── Resolution.ts # 布局适配配置中心
│ │ └── AppContext.ts # 全局App上下文
│ ├── components # 项目中通用的业务组件目录
│ ├── config # 项目配置文件
│ ├── pages # 项目页面目录
│ ├── typings # 项目中d.ts 声明文件目录
│ ├── types # 项目中声明文件
│ │ ├── service # 项目中服务相关声明文件
│ │ ├── enum.ts # 项目中枚举类型
│ │ ├── IContext.ts  # 全局App上下文声明
│ │ ├── IRedux.ts # redux相关声明
│ │ └── IRouterPage.ts # 路由相关声明
│ ├── uiLibrary # 组件库
│ ├── routes # 路由目录
│ │ ├── index.tsx # 路由配置入口文件
│ │ └── RouterUI.tsx # 路由转换
│ ├── services # 和后端相关的文件目录
│ │ ├── api # 调用后端接口定义目录
│ │ │ ├── index.ts
│ │ ├── axios.ts # 基于 axios 二次封装
│ │ ├── BaseService.ts # 基础请求服务类型
│ │ ├── ServerResponseManager.ts # 服务返回统一管理
│ │ ├── serviceConfig.ts # 服务地址配置文件
│ ├── store # redux 仓库
│ │ ├── actionCreaters # action创建与分发绑定
│ │ ├── action  # 项目中action
│ │ ├── reducers  # 项目中reducers
│ │ │  ├──history # 项目中路由相关history
│ │ ├── index.ts # 全局 store 获取
│ │ ├── connect.ts # react 页面与store 连接
│ ├── utils # 全局通用工具函数目录
│ ├── App.tsx # App全局
│ ├── index.tsx # 项目入口文件
│ ├── index.scss # 项目入口引入的scss
└── tsconfig.json # TS 配置文件
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-3">项目地址</h2>
<p>如果您觉得上面的React模板项目结构能够吸引你，可以去看看源码 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fqyjandroid%2Freact-project-template" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" title="https://github.com/qyjandroid/react-project-template" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">react-project-template</a></p>
<p>并且也做了相关的脚手架<a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fqyjandroid%2Freact-cli" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" title="https://github.com/qyjandroid/react-cli" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">quanyj-react-cli</a>,你的 star 是我不断前行的动力！</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-4">项目介绍</h2>
<ul>
<li>
<p>项目中引入了 <code>core.scss </code>, 全局公用，直接使用不需要每个scss文件@import</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>构建项目时会自动兼容 CSS3 样式，所以不需要自己去写浏览器兼容样式</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>项目支持配置路由</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>项目中集成了 <code>connected-react-router</code> ，路由存储在store中，界面直接从store获取</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>项目中默认使用immer来代替immutable</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>项目中默认配置了一些常用工具函数</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>项目中针对 <code>axios</code> 做了二次封装</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>项目直接使用px即可</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>项目大量使用装饰器，例如@connect,@context等来简化代码。</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-5">部分代码片段</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-6">页面使用案例</h3>
<p>使用装饰器connect从store中获取数据</p>
<p>使用装饰器withAppContextDecorators 从AppContext内容提供者中获取数据</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-tsx copyable" lang="tsx"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> React <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"react"</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> Page <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"@/components/Page"</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> &#123; UPDATE_USER_ID &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"@/store/actions/user"</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> connect <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"@/store/connect"</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> CPng <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"@/assets//images/02.png"</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> HomeChild <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"./HomeChild"</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> &#123; withAppContextDecorators &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'@/common/AppContext'</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> <span class="hljs-string">"./index.scss"</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> &#123; IAppContext &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'@/types/IContext'</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">interface</span> IHomeProps &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">userId</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">number</span>;
    updateId: <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">id: <span class="hljs-built_in">number</span></span>) =></span> <span class="hljs-built_in">void</span>;
&#125;

<span class="hljs-keyword">interface</span> IHomeState &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">count</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">number</span>
&#125;

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> mapStateToProps = &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">userId</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"user.userId"</span>
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> mapDispatchToProps = &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">updateId</span>: UPDATE_USER_ID
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-meta">@withAppContextDecorators</span>
<span class="hljs-meta">@connect</span>(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)
<span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">Home</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">extends</span> <span class="hljs-title">Page</span><<span class="hljs-title">IHomeProps</span> & <span class="hljs-title">IAppContext</span>, <span class="hljs-title">IHomeState</span>></span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">constructor</span>(<span class="hljs-params">props</span>)</span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-built_in">super</span>(props);
        <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.state = &#123;
            <span class="hljs-attr">count</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>
        &#125;;
    &#125;

    componentDidMount = <span class="hljs-function">() =></span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-built_in">setTimeout</span>(<span class="hljs-function">() =></span> &#123;
            <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.props.updateId(<span class="hljs-number">5</span>);
        &#125;, <span class="hljs-number">3000</span>)
        <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.props.test());
        <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.setState(&#123;
            <span class="hljs-attr">count</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>
        &#125;)
    &#125;

    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">render</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> &#123; userId &#125; = <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.props;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> &#123; count &#125; = <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.state;
        <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">"this.props=="</span>, <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.props);
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> (
            <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">'home'</span>></span>
                <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"text1"</span>></span>Hello, World!&#123;userId&#125; <span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">div</span>></span>
                <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"bg1"</span>></span>&#123;count&#125;<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">div</span>></span>
                <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">img</span> <span class="hljs-attr">className</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"img1"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">src</span>=<span class="hljs-string">&#123;CPng&#125;</span> ></span><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">img</span>></span>
                <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">HomeChild</span>></span><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">HomeChild</span>></span>

        );

<h3 data-id="heading-7">路由配置</h3>
<p>路由可配置，实现懒加载以及分包</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-tsx copyable" lang="tsx"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> React <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'react'</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">routes</span>: [
        &#123;
            <span class="hljs-attr">exact</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>,
            <span class="hljs-attr">path</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'/'</span>,
            <span class="hljs-attr">isDynamic</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>,
            <span class="hljs-attr">component</span>: React.lazy(<span class="hljs-function">() =></span>
                <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span>(<span class="hljs-comment">/* webpackChunkName: "home",webpackPrefetch: true */</span> <span class="hljs-string">'@/pages/Home'</span>),
            ),
        &#125;,
        &#123;
            <span class="hljs-attr">exact</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>,
            <span class="hljs-attr">path</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'/page1'</span>,
            <span class="hljs-attr">isDynamic</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>,
            <span class="hljs-attr">component</span>: React.lazy(<span class="hljs-function">() =></span>
                <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span>(<span class="hljs-comment">/* webpackChunkName: "page1",webpackPrefetch: true */</span> <span class="hljs-string">'@/pages/Page1'</span>),
            ),
        &#125;,
    ],
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-8">自适配组件封装</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-tsx copyable" lang="tsx"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> React <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"react"</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> Resolutions <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"@/common/Resolution"</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">interface</span> IResolutionComProps &#123;
    WIDTH?: <span class="hljs-built_in">number</span>;
&#125;

<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">ResolutionCom</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">extends</span> <span class="hljs-title">React</span>.<span class="hljs-title">Component</span><<span class="hljs-title">IResolutionComProps</span>> </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">componentDidMount</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.resize();
        <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.onresize = <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.resize;
    &#125;
    resize = <span class="hljs-function">() =></span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-comment">//获取设计稿的尺寸</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> design = Resolutions.getDesign();
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> getHtmlFs = <span class="hljs-function">() =></span> &#123;
            <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">parseFloat</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.getComputedStyle(html, <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>)[<span class="hljs-string">"font-size"</span>]);
        &#125;;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> getScreenWidth = <span class="hljs-function">() =></span> &#123;
            <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> htmlWidth = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
            <span class="hljs-keyword">try</span> &#123;
                <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> htmlElement = <span class="hljs-built_in">document</span>.documentElement;
                htmlWidth = <span class="hljs-built_in">Math</span>.max(htmlElement.offsetWidth || <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, htmlElement.clientWidth || <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, htmlElement.getBoundingClientRect().width || <span class="hljs-number">0</span>);
                <span class="hljs-comment">// 读取失败，其他方式读取</span>
                <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!htmlWidth || htmlWidth <= <span class="hljs-number">0</span>) &#123;
                    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.orientation == <span class="hljs-number">180</span> || <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.orientation == <span class="hljs-number">0</span>) &#123;
                        <span class="hljs-comment">//竖屏</span>
                        htmlWidth = <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.innerWidth || (<span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.screen && <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.screen.width) || (<span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.screen && <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.screen.availWidth) || <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
                    &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.orientation == <span class="hljs-number">90</span> || <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.orientation == -<span class="hljs-number">90</span>) &#123;
                        <span class="hljs-comment">//横屏</span>
                        htmlWidth = <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.innerHeight || (<span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.screen && <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.screen.height) || (<span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.screen && <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.screen.availHeight) || <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
                    &#125;
                &#125;
            &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">catch</span> (e) &#123;
                <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">"获取屏幕宽度出错"</span>);
            &#125;
            <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> htmlWidth | <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
        &#125;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> html = <span class="hljs-built_in">document</span>.documentElement,
            WIDTH = <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.props.WIDTH || design.WIDTH,
            <span class="hljs-comment">//第一次进来没有设置过html标签font-size的时候</span>
            screenWidth = getScreenWidth(),
            htmlFs = getHtmlFs(),
            mediaFs = (design.RATIO / WIDTH) * screenWidth; <span class="hljs-comment">//获取页面宽度  设备宽度/fontSize=设计稿（750）/100=7.5;</span>

        html.style.fontSize = mediaFs + <span class="hljs-string">"px"</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">//根据页面大小算出font-size</span>

        <span class="hljs-comment">//以下是特殊处理 试过一台htc下的某个浏览器设置字体大小后再获取font-size会比所设的值会相对变小 所以设置大一点让它font-size的结果是想设的结果</span>

        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (htmlFs !== mediaFs && <span class="hljs-built_in">Math</span>.abs(htmlFs - mediaFs) > <span class="hljs-number">2</span>) &#123;
            html.style.fontSize = <span class="hljs-string">"100px"</span>;
            html.style.fontSize = (<span class="hljs-number">100</span> / getHtmlFs()) * mediaFs + <span class="hljs-string">"px"</span>;
        &#125;
    &#125;;
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">render</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.props.children;
    &#125;
&#125;

<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-9">connected-react-router 修改源码,支持使用immer</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-tsx copyable" lang="tsx"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> &#123; createHashHistory &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'history'</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> produce <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"immer"</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> &#123; LOCATION_CHANGE &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'connected-react-router'</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> &#123; IActionParam &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"@/types/IRedux"</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> history = createHashHistory();
<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> history;

<span class="hljs-comment">//import &#123; push &#125; from 'connected-react-router';</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">//提供了push,go,goBack,replace,block,goForward方法。</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">//push("/home") || push(&#123;pathname:"/home",search:"name=1",hash:"1"&#125;)</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">//history 可以分为两部分，切换和修改，切换历史状态：back,forward,go对应浏览器的后退，跳转，前进。history.go(2);//前进两次</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">//push 把页面状态保存在state对象中，当页面回来的时候，可以通过event.state获取到state对象。</span>




<span class="hljs-comment">//查看connected-react-router 的connectRouter 方法，使immer与history 结合使用</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">interface</span> HistoryState &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">location</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">any</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">action</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">any</span>,
&#125;

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> injectQuery = <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">location</span>) =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (location && location.query) &#123;
        <span class="hljs-comment">// Don't inject query if it already exists in history</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> location
    &#125;

    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> searchQuery = location && location.search

    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> searchQuery !== <span class="hljs-string">'string'</span> || searchQuery.length === <span class="hljs-number">0</span>) &#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> &#123;
            ...location,
            <span class="hljs-attr">query</span>: &#123;&#125;
        &#125;
    &#125;

    <span class="hljs-comment">// Ignore the `?` part of the search string e.g. ?username=codejockie</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> search = searchQuery.substring(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
    <span class="hljs-comment">// Split the query string on `&` e.g. ?username=codejockie&name=Kennedy</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> queries = search.split(<span class="hljs-string">'&'</span>)
    <span class="hljs-comment">// Contruct query</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> query = queries.reduce(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">acc, currentQuery</span>) =></span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-comment">// Split on `=`, to get key and value</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> [queryKey, queryValue] = currentQuery.split(<span class="hljs-string">'='</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> &#123;
            ...acc,
            [queryKey]: queryValue
        &#125;
    &#125;, &#123;&#125;)

    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> &#123;
        ...location,
        query
    &#125;
&#125;


<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> initHistoryState: HistoryState = &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">location</span>: injectQuery(history.location),
    <span class="hljs-attr">action</span>: history.action,
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-comment">/* eslint-disable no-param-reassign  */</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> reducer = produce(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">draft: HistoryState, actionParam: IActionParam</span>) =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (actionParam.type === LOCATION_CHANGE) &#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> &#123; location, action, isFirstRendering &#125; = actionParam.payload;
        draft.action = action;
        draft.location = injectQuery(location);
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> draft;
    &#125;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> draft;
&#125;, initHistoryState);



<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
